title: Bears and man
creator_credit: Bill Schmalz, Wild Cine Productions and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Two-thirds of all injuries inflicted by bears are inflicted by those who have become panhandling garbage junkies. This film describes the Parks Canada bear-management program in Canada’s mountain national parks. It is designed to protect the visiting public from confrontation with and injury by the bears. Awards: New York; Missoula; Columbus.
